abstract: Mr. Hurley, 33, will be replaced by a Google veteran, Salar Kamanga, but will remain an adviser to the company.
snippet: Mr. Hurley, 33, will be replaced by a Google veteran, Salar Kamanga, but will remain an adviser to the company.
lead_paragraph: Chad Hurley, a YouTube co-founder who helped broker the sale of the online video behemoth to Google, will step down as chief executive, according to The Associated Press.

headline.main: YouTube Chief Hurley to Step Down
